§ 7562. Clothing The President may prescribe the quantity and kind of clothing to be issued annually to members of the Army. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 256, § 4562; renumbered § 7562, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 808(d), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1839.)
